category.name: Women
category.description: You will find here all woman fashion collections. This category includes all the basics of your wardrobe and much more: shoes, accessories, printed t-shirts, feminine dresses, women's jeans!

category.name: Coats and Jackets
category.description: Coats, jackets, blazers, puffer jackets and leather jackets! Enjoy our wide choice of coat to pick the one who will keep you warm during winter.

category.name: Coats
category.description: Choose the perfect coat that best suits your style. Casual, classic, modern, timeless coats you will find everyting here!

category.name: Jackets
category.description: Get your wardrobe covered with our wide range of jackets!

category.name: Blazers
category.description: Opt for a modern silhouette by selecting from our wide range of blazers.

category.name: Puffer Jackets
category.description: The must have of winter, find the perfect puffer jacket to keep you warm and stylish during winter.

category.name: Leather Jackets
category.description: Perfect for the beginning of the season, the leather jacket will give you a rock style for any occasion.

category.name: Tops
category.description: Choose from t-shirts, tops, blouses, short sleeves, long sleeves, tank tops, 3/4 sleeves and more. Find the cut that suits you the best!

category.name: T-shirts
category.description: The must have of your wardrobe, take a look at our different colors, shapes and style of our collection!

category.name: Tops
category.description: Choose the top that best suits you from the wide variety of tops we have.

category.name: Blouses
category.description: Match your favorites blouses with the right accessories for the perfect look.

category.name: Pants
category.description: How to choose a fashion woman pants? Skinny cut, straight cut, benefit from a wide choice and choose your pants here!

category.name: Skinny Cut
category.description: To get the perfect minimalist silhouette, take a look to our skinny cut jeans!

category.name: Straight Cut
category.description: Opt for a straight cut jean to have the perfect classic look;

category.name: Dresses
category.description: Find your favorites dresses from our wide choice of evening, casual or summer dresses! We offer dresses for every day, every style and every occasion.

category.name: Casual Dresses
category.description: You are looking for a dress for every day? Take a look at our selection of dresses to find one that suits you.

category.name: Evening Dresses
category.description: Browse our different dresses to choose the perfect dress for an unforgettable evening!

category.name: Summer Dresses
category.description: Short dress, long dress, silk dress, printed dress, you will find the perfect dress for summer.

category.name: Accessories
category.description: Shoes, bags, belts, hats... Our range of accessories will enhance your silhouette and make you more feminine

category.name: Belts
category.description: thin skinny belts, leather waist belts and hip belts... Choose among our wide collection to accessorize your outfit.

category.name: Hats
category.description: Accessorize your look with our range of hats. In every color, style, shape and size, you're sure to find your perfect topper outfit here.

category.name: Handbags
category.description: The bag is an essential accessory in the wardrobe of a woman. Find a bag that will go perfectly with your outfit of the day!

category.name: Shoes
category.description: A wide variety of women's shoes is available. You will find boots, shoes, slippers, sandals and sneakers to go with your outfit of the day.
